metadata.title: CVE-2022-26148 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Grafana through 7.3.4, when integrated withZabbix. The Zabbix password can be found in the api_jsonrpc.php HTML sourcecode. When the user logs in and allows the user to register, one can rightclick to view the source code and use Ctrl-F to search for password inapi_jsonrpc.php to discover the Zabbix account password and URL address.

criterions.comment: grafana package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
